mapper.insert: insert into moim_board ( moim_board_no, moim_no, member_email, moim_board_title, moim_board_content, moim_board_category ) values( #{moimBoardNo}, #{moimNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{moimBoardTitle}, #{moimBoardContent}, #{moimBoardCategory})
